titles.title: I Am The Bread Of Life

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The bread that I will give Is My flesh for the life of the world, And he who eats of this bread, He shall live forever — he shall live forever.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unless — you — eat Of the flesh of the Son of Man And drink of His blood — and drink of His blood, You shall not have life within you.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I Am the resurrection, I Am the life He who believes in me — even if he dies, He shall live forever.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes, Lord, I believe That You are the Christ, The Son of God Who has come into the world. 10. And I will raise him up, And I will raise him up, And I will raise him up on the last day.{/lang-eng}
